trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked ask [Please enter a decimal number:] and wait set [decimal number v] to (answer) set [bit value v] to [1] set [binary number v] to [] repeat until <(decimal number) < (bit value)> set [bit value v] to ((bit value) * (2)) end repeat until <(bit value) = [1]> set [bit value v] to ((bit value) / (2)) if <<(decimal number) > (bit value)> or <(decimal number) = (bit value)>> then set [binary number v] to (join (binary number) [1]) set [decimal number v] to ((decimal number) - (bit value)) else set [binary number v] to (join (binary number) [0]) end end say (join (join (join [The binary representation for the number ] (answer)) [ is ]) (binary number))
